law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 27, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 3, Sec. 131.] No fees shall in any case be taken from those seeking the benefits of said employment offices. Any superintendent or clerk who directly or indirectly charges or receives any fee in the performance of his duties shall be punished by a fine of not more than one hundred dollars or by imprisonment in jail for not more than one month, and shall be disqualified from holding further connection with said office.
